job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pThe Data Scientist will report to the Senior Data Scientist within the University Analytics and Institutional Research department UAIR and will assist in the development and responsibilities of an integrated institutional planning office for the University of Arizona The Data Scientist will serve as a liaison between the University Planning Office and UAIR and will be instrumental in providing statistical and predictive insights to University Senior Leadership to further institutional strategic goals The scope of the office will be focused on institutional planning surrounding projections years into the future The data scientists concentration will be on developing statistical predictive and prescriptive models to help guide the work of the planning office as well as support the broader data science needs of UAIR The position will require not only the ability to carry out complex technical data science requirements but also to communicate and share relevant insights from statistical analysis and modelingppnbspppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliDevelop and implement statistical machinelearning and heuristic techniques to create descriptivenbspdiagnosticnbsppredictive and prescriptive analyticsnbspliliCollaborate with experts in various subject areas to get an understanding of underlying business processes strategiesnbspcircumstancesnbspand execution to produce effective statistical and machinelearning modelsnbspliliIdentify opportunities to enhance our current analytical capabilities and develop new analytics products to enhance business insights and functions through expert mathematical analytical and computational techniquesnbspand guidancenbspliliIdentify approaches to improve accuracy and effectiveness ofnbspexistingnbspanalytical modelsnbspliliPresentnbspdatadrivennbspinformed and resultsbasednbspconclusions and recommendations to both internal and externalnbspleadership college
